name: Flight Rising: Classic Flight Banners
description: Replaces the new banners with their old, more aesthetically pleasing counterparts. Applies to both profiles and the little box up top when you're logged into the site.
additional_info:
Works in Firefox. Should also work in Chrome.

Screenshot is not my account, and was censored for the user's privacy. (Person with default icon used so that nobody can be hunted down via their avatar dragon.) Seriously, I'm not taking any risks with screenshots, given the ludicrous controversy surrounding the use of Stylish.
